mapper.insert: insert into publish_content ( category, description, images, contact_name, mobilephone, city, location, address, is_top, create_time, update_time, is_del ) values ( #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select id, agency_name as agencyName, sys_user_name as sysUserName, sys_user_password as sysUserPassword, mobilephone as mobilephone, email as email, open_id as openId, is_cooperation as isCooperation, city, location, address, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_del as isDel from agency_base where is_del = 0 limit #{start},#{length}

select id, category, description, images, contact_name as contactName, mobilephone, city, location, update_time as updateTime, create_time as createTime from publish_content where id = #{id} and is_del = 0

select id, category, description, images, contact_name as contactName, mobilephone, city, location, status update_time as updateTime, create_time as createTime from publish_content where status = #{status} and is_del = 0

select c.id, c.category, c.description, c.images, c.contact_name as contactName, c.mobilephone, c.city, c.location, c.status, c.update_time as updateTime, c.create_time as createTime from publish_content c left join parameter p on c.category = p.para_value where c.is_del = 0 and p.para_domain = 'publish.category' limit #{start},#{length}
select count(id) from publish_content where is_del = 0
